title: Preserving Second Families and Chosen Families
description:
Who do you consider your family? The answer is different for everyone... and it may be more complicated and nuanced than we tend to believe. On this week's episode of In Good Faith, Judah and Chelsea share how they navigate all things family — your original family, your second family, and even your chosen family.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
